summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to defense counsel, transmitting a supplemental production of discovery materials (including 3500 material, non-testifying witness material, and exhibits) for the case United States v. Maxwell. The email includes several attached PDF files containing cover letters and indexes.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, transmitting supplemental discovery materials to defense counsel in the case United States v. Maxwell.

events.title: Supplemental Discovery Production in US v. Maxwell
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney sends a supplemental production of 3500 material, discovery, non-testifying witness material, and exhibits to defense counsel via email with attached indexes and cover letters.

locations: One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The document is a 2021 email regarding the ongoing criminal case United States v. Maxwell.
It shows the prosecution (SDNY) providing supplemental discovery to the defense, including 3500 material, non-testifying witness material, and exhibits.
The transmission indicates active pre-trial litigation and evidence sharing between parties.
The correspondence originates from the United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
Multiple detailed indexes and cover letters were attached, suggesting a substantial volume of material was produced.
